sn52.6:4.3: “What things has Venerable Anuruddha developed and cultivated to attain great direct knowledge?”
sn52.6:4.4: “Reverends, I attained great direct knowledge by developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
sn52.6:4.6: I meditate by observing an aspect of the body, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn52.6:4.7: I meditate by observing an aspect of feelings …
sn52.6:4.9: principles, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn52.6:4.10: I attained great direct knowledge by developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
sn52.6:4.11: And it’s because of developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation that I directly know the entire galaxy.”
